isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL RIDE OPTIMIZED SUSPENSION (IROS) - component removal - Main Support Member Bushings

svcproc.title: Main Support Member Bushings
svcproc.para: The bushing assembly is mounted in each main support member assembly.

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. TAPERED SPRING ASSEMBLY FRONT MOUNTING HOLES

svcproc.para: The bushing assembly is mounted in each main support member assembly. This assembly is pressed into the main support member assembly; flange must be on the in-board side. The main support member assembly with bushing is placed into the chassis forward spring suspension mounting bracket and is bolted in place. The bushing pin angle must be relative to the main support member. Mark the orientation of bushing on main support member. When replacing new bushing check alignment with mark on main support member. The bolts are tightened to the correct torque value as specified in the TORQUE CHART.
